attributes.action: Increase sea bass keep size to 45cm
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Sea bass are a slow growing fish as all marine scientists will know. A fish about 10lb is about 12-16 years old. At the current size limit for sea bass at 36 cm they don't have time to breed. So take this into account if you take fish before they can breed wheres the fish to catch in the years to come.
